description: This project is a dashboard consuming the data Actor Server serves. I'm doing it to learn more/better Vue principles and put into practice some teachings I find working through others' work.
name: Actor Dashboard

description: This project is attempting to be a live, constantly evolving system meant to run on a server and emulate an MMO or similar fantasy landscape. That includes creating characters, their roles and effects on the world around them. It's primary role is to teach myself more/better Javascript principles as I learn them.
name: Actor Server

description: This project is a test in social media marketing and creating a viral, useful web application for those that (may) need it most.
name: Commish

description: This project is a community-driven dice-sharing platform for people to communicate, trade and post images of their dice. It exists to take the teachings of other projects and combine it with running an online PaaS.
name: Dice Fiends

description: This project is a character management platform for Dungeons & Dragons based TRPGs. It exists to learn things like data management on AWS, permissions and authentication and data-extrapolation from filetypes.
name: Hero Tavern

description: This project is an easy-to-use but detailed Dungeons & Dragons information database. It exists to take the teachings of other projects and combine it with running an online PaaS. It's evolving and changing often but will hopefully stabilize soon.
name: Tavern Tales

description: This project is a product for a car-detailing business. It exists to put into production-practice the tools and systems learnt elsewhere.
name: AFW Car Care

description: This project. Literally. Somewhere to store and hold myself accountable of the projects that I hold important. Essentially keeps me guided and avoid side-project-creep.
name: Github Project List

description: This project is a simple text-based game to learn game-development, iOS, Unity and Godot.
name: Petrichor
